page.title: 17THE PRESENT POPULATION.
page.content:
In addition,the type of profession undertaken by many Haslingfield residents takes them all over Britain, and often the World,and so they are often required to move house.This explains why (a) there are more people who have lived less than,as opposed to more than,10 years in the village; (b) there are more people who previously lived more than,as opposed to less than,10 miles from the village,and (c) the number of retired people in Haslingfield is comparatively low.
(D.Winton-Smith,B.Watson & R.Oyston).
